Name: Disable cache
Description: Can I disable cache for the network requests?
Author: @pankajparashar

Chrome.Notes: 1. Open Network panel > Look for "Disable cache" in the toolbar at the top.
Chrome.Name: Disable cache

Firefox.Notes: 1. Open Network panel > Look for "Disable Cache" in the toolbar at the top.
Firefox.Name: Disable cache

Edge.Notes: 1. Open Network panel > Look for "Disable Cache" in the toolbar at the top.
Edge.Name: Disable cache

Safari.Name: Disable cache
Safari.Notes: 1. Open Network panel > Look for the icon in the top right of the toolbar with tooltip "Ignore the resource cache when loading resources".

Opera.Notes: 1. Open Network panel > Look for "Disable cache" in the toolbar at the top.
Opera.Name: Disable cache
